summary: A high-quality photo editing Android app (APK). The app will allow users to edit photos with various tools and filters.
architectural_notes: Focus on high-quality image processing and output
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Dark-themed photo editor app logo mark — abstract camera aperture or lens icon with teal and amber gradient accents on a dark background (pixelcraft-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Placeholder/sample photo for the editor canvas default state — a vibrant landscape photo with rich colors (sample-photo.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Build a photo editing application where users can upload a photo from their device and see it displayed in a central canvas/preview area.
Implement core photo transformation tools: crop (with draggable handles), rotate (90° clockwise/counter-clockwise), and flip (horizontal/vertical).
Implement a set of one-click photo filters/effects (e.g., Vivid, B&W, Sepia, Warm, Cool, Fade, Sharpen) that are applied via CSS/Canvas filters to the preview image.
Add adjustment sliders for brightness, contrast, saturation, and sharpness that modify the image in real-time as the user drags each slider.

Implement a high-quality image export feature that renders all applied edits (transformations, filters, adjustments) onto a Canvas element and downloads the result as a PNG file at the original image resolution.

Design a sleek, dark-mode photo editor UI with a deep charcoal/slate color palette, crisp white typography, and vibrant accent highlights. Layout should follow a professional editor pattern: top toolbar, central canvas, left/right side panels for tools and adjustments, and a bottom filter strip.

new_feature_requests.summary: Photo editing core: crop, rotate, flip tools
Brightness, contrast, saturation, and color adjustment sliders
